title: onurtorumoglu
author: onurtorumoglu
content: AnnouncementWelcome to https://eupool.clubThe site itself is fork of a Yiimp based ScriptWe are simple Alt Coin Mining Pool All Fees for either Pool or Solo are 0.5 FeeIt has been running since Octoober 1, 2022.As of the time writing this we have three coins  [Onyx], [Sprintpay], [BitCash], [Pigeoncoin],[Apixcash],[FoxDcoin],[Avian],[RVN Classic]...Why use us?Good question• Pool and Solo Mining 0.5 Fee• No Registration Required• Payouts are made automatically every 2 hours for all balances above 0.001, or 0.0001 ( Plan on changing this in the near future suggestions?)• Fully Supports Rented Hash Power from Mining Rig Rentals / Nicehash and many more•We guarantee 1 ms worldwide, we are assertive You will do wonders with 10 gbit internet infrastructure.As of right now i'm open to suggestions to adding more coins•Be sure to follow our Youtube channel, we will notify you in advance of all new coins.Lets get hashing!!Support•https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC73QoDEzWBRt8ENFzsXn50w•https://discord.gg/w2e4aCz32j•https://t.me/miningrehberi

comments.author: Osaid1
comments.body: Congrats. Good luck to your service Can you possibly support SCC? (Algo: FiroPOW)https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418473.0Currently its supported by limited poolshttps://miningpoolstats.stream/stakecubecoin
